description:
Modern, affordable hotel across from Gare du Nord

Across from Gare du Nord
The Mercure Paris Terminus Nord is across the street from Gare du Nord in Paris's 10th arrondissement. It's a convenient spot if you're traveling by train, including Eurostar and the TGV. As an added bonus, there are 5 connecting metro and RER lines.

Stay local or go metro
Hop on the metro and you'll be at the Louvre in 7 stops (Line 7) or in trendy Saint-Germain-des-Prs in 8 stops (Line 4). You can stick around the neighborhood (and get a serious workout) by walking 1.2 km north uphill to the unmissable views from the Sacr-Coeur in Montmartre.

Eat and drink
The dark wood, striped carpet, and red-and-gold furniture create an elegant atmosphere in the lobby bar, Golden Arrow. You can enjoy a daily hot breakfast buffet in the recently renovated dining area. Guests give high marks to friendly, helpful staff.

Parisian rooms
All 236 guestrooms have a sleek-but-classic Paris vibe, with dark wood accents and rich fabrics. WiFi is available (surcharge) to help you stay connected and rooms are equipped with LCD TVs. Too tired to go out after a long train ride? Room service is available 24 hours a day.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Modern, affordable hotel across from Gare du Nord

Across from Gare du Nord
The Mercure Paris Terminus Nord is across the street from Gare du Nord in Paris's 10th arrondissement. It's a convenient spot if you're traveling by train, including Eurostar and the TGV. As an added bonus, there are 5 connecting metro and RER lines.

Stay local or go metro
Hop on the metro and you'll be at the Louvre in 7 stops (Line 7) or in trendy Saint-Germain-des-Prs in 8 stops (Line 4). You can stick around the neighborhood (and get a serious workout) by walking 1.2 km north uphill to the unmissable views from the Sacr-Coeur in Montmartre.

Eat and drink
The dark wood, striped carpet, and red-and-gold furniture create an elegant atmosphere in the lobby bar, Golden Arrow. You can enjoy a daily hot breakfast buffet in the recently renovated dining area. Guests give high marks to friendly, helpful staff.

Parisian rooms
All 236 guestrooms have a sleek-but-classic Paris vibe, with dark wood accents and rich fabrics. WiFi is available (surcharge) to help you stay connected and rooms are equipped with LCD TVs. Too tired to go out after a long train ride? Room service is available 24 hours a day.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access. This 4-star property offers access to a business center and meeting rooms. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Event facilities measure 3357 square feet (312 square meters). This business-friendly hotel also offers complimentary newspapers in the lobby, laundry facilities, and dry cleaning/laundry services.

Mercure Paris Terminus Nord is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value:
Continental breakfasts are available for a surcharge and are served each morning between 6:30 AM and 10 AM.
24-hour room service is available.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Folies Bergere - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Porte Saint-Denis - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Basilica of the Sacred Heart of Paris - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Place du Tertre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Espace Dali - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Place de la Republique - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Paris Bourse - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Opera Comique - 1.6 km / 1 mi

Galeries Lafayette - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Theatre Mogador - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Paris Opera - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Parc des Buttes Chaumont - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Forum des Halles - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Place de Clichy - 2 km / 1.3 mi

The closest major airports to Mercure Paris Terminus Nord are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 16.8 km / 10.5 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 21 km / 13.1 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Paris Terminus Nord is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Situated in Paris, this hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Folies Bergere, Basilica of the Sacred Heart of Paris, and Galeries Lafayette. Moulin Rouge and Paris Opera are also within 2 mi (3 km).

NATIONAL_RATING.value: This hotel has received its official star rating from the French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for continental breakfast: EUR 17 per person (approximately)
  • Pet fee: EUR 30 per pet, per night
  • Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

MANDATORY_HOTEL_IMPOSED_FEES.value:
You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:


  • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.48 per person, per night

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel with bar/lounge, near Basilica of the Sacred Heart of Paris

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

HCOM_INTERNET_AT_A_GLANCE.value:
• Free WiFi in public areas

  • Free WiFi in rooms

HCOM_MANDATORY_TAXES.value: • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.48 per person, per night

HCOM_FEES_INROOM.value: Rollaway beds are available for an additional charge

HCOM_FEES_DINING.value: Continental breakfast is offered for an extra charge of EUR 17 per person (approximately)

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_PETS.value: Pets are allowed for an extra charge of EUR 30 per pet, per night

GOLD.value: Mercure Paris Terminus Nord puts you in Paris's 10th arrondissement, across the street from Gare du Nord. Multiple train lines (TGV, Eurostar), as well as 5 different metro and RER lines are easily accessible. A nice hotel bar is a convenient place for a nightcap. In on a late train? The hotel has 24-hour room service. Free WiFi in the public areas helps keep you connected (surcharge in rooms).

GUESTS_LOVE.value:
Guests Love
  • Conveniently located next to Gare du Nord

  • Nice bar

  • Friendly staff

  • 24-hour room service

    • Keep in Mind
  • Surrounding neighborhood is a little lackluster

END_OF_THE_DAY.value:
At the end of the day
Our guests appreciate Mercure Paris Terminus Nord's convenient location, right next door to Gare du Nord. Some feel the surrounding neighborhood is a little lackluster, but most are satisfied to hop on the adjacent metro for easy access to sights.

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 236 smoke-free guestrooms
  • Breakfast available
  • Bar/lounge
  • Business center
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Air conditioning
  • Front desk safe
  • Laundry service
  • Meeting rooms
  • Free newspapers in the lobby
  • Luggage storage

ROOM_FEATURE.value: When you stay at Mercure Paris Terminus Nord, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Moulin Rouge and Parc des Buttes Chaumont. You can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge, and continental breakfast is available daily. Rooms at this upscale hotel offer 24-hour room service, LCD TVs, and free WiFi.
